column1: * 1913 - Tolkien Letter to Edith Bratt (3 January 1913) Edith Tolkien
column2: who subsequently breaks off her engagement with another man.

column1: * 1972 - The Tolkien Society wishes J.R.R. Tolkien a happy 80th birthday in The Times.
* 1972 - The Tolkien Society sends Tolkien a jar of tobacco as a birthday present.

column2: Suomen Tolkien-seura ry. (the Finnish Tolkien Society
column4: the Finnish Tolkien Society Kontu) is founded.

column1: * 2001 - The Sociedad Tolkien Peruana is founded.
